scripts.build:assets: vite build --config src/assets/ai/vite.config.js && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.min.mjs assets/pdfjs.js && cp node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs assets/pdfjs.worker.js
